title: Login page crashes on submit
description: When I click the submit button on the login page, the application crashes with a 500 error. I am using Chrome on Windows.
analysis: This seems to be a critical frontend issue affecting user access.

title: Add dark mode support
description: It would be great to have a dark mode for the dashboard. The white background is too bright at night.

title: Database connection timeout
description: The API is returning 504 Gateway Timeout errors intermittently. Logs show database connection pool exhaustion.

title: Login button not working
description: Clicking login does nothing. Same behavior as reported by others.

title: Typo in welcome email
description: The welcome email says 'Welcom' instead of 'Welcome'.

title: Old stale issue about deprecated API
description: We need to update the v1 API endpoint documentation.
